Title: Ron and Tammy II
Plot: Tom tries to get back at Ron by going out on a date with Ron's ex-wife Tammy, while Leslie tries to protect Ron from falling prey to her charms. Meanwhile, April is assigned to work with Chris.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Megan Mullally, Jama Williamson, Eric Pierpoint
